summary: Completed testing of LittleHelper AI - P0 (Multi-agent build), P1 (Global Assistant), P2 (Admin Plans). All priority features are working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - endpoint may not be fully implemented for conversation history listing

ui_bugs.issue: Send button click intercepted by 'Made with Emergent' badge overlay - requires JavaScript click workaround

issues: Shows 'Invalid Date' for project creation date

action_items: Consider implementing /api/conversations endpoint for conversation history
Fix 'Invalid Date' display on project cards
Consider z-index fix for send button to avoid overlay interception
critical_code_review_comments: All three priority features (P0, P1, P2) are working correctly
AI endpoints (/api/ai/plan, /api/ai/execute-task) generate actual code successfully
Global Assistant chat works with real AI responses
Admin Plans tab correctly shows both Subscription Plans and Credit Packages sections
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0/P1/P2 features verified working. Backend API tests in /app/tests/test_littlehelper_api.py. Global Assistant requires JavaScript click due to overlay. Admin Plans tab has two sections: Monthly Subscription Plans and Credit Add-on Packages.

details: /api/ai/plan endpoint generates build plans with tasks
